Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Consumer Affairs and Business Licensing, Committee on Parks and Recreation and the Committee on Resiliency and Waterfronts

Items.Title: Oversight - Tree Removals and the Restoration of Power in the Aftermath of Tropical Storm Isaias.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Tree Removals and the Restoration of Power in the Aftermath of Tropical Storm Isaias.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Consumer Affairs and Business Licensing, Committee on Parks and Recreation and the Committee on Resiliency and Waterfronts

Resolution calling upon Consolidated Edison to increase resources dedicated to service restoration on a borough by borough basis and create a report of the most vulnerable utility infrastructure in each borough.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Consolidated Edison to increase resources dedicated to service restoration on a borough by borough basis and create a report of the most vulnerable utility infrastructure in each borough.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State legislature to pass and the Governor to sign legislation to require Consolidated Edison to cover the costs of wires downed or damaged by a storm that run from private homes to utility poles.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Require Consolidated Edison to cover the costs of wires downed or damaged by a storm that run from private homes to utility poles.
